statements: DELETE FROM users WHERE user_id = 1 AND age > 30;
DELETE FROM users WHERE gender = 'Female' OR location LIKE '%New York%';
DELETE FROM user_behavior WHERE user_id = 101 AND clicks > 1000
DELETE FROM user_demographics WHERE age < 20 AND gender = 'Female'
DELETE FROM user_demographics WHERE age > 30 AND location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM user_behavior WHERE behavior_type = 'click' AND date_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM users WHERE user_id = 1000 AND age < 25
DELETE FROM ad_actions WHERE campaign_id = 500 AND action_type = 'click'
DELETE FROM ads WHERE ad_type = 'Sponsored' AND ad_cost > 500.00;
